Light Label & Text Dark Top Bar Always Show Top Bar Reset All Icons Reset All Labels Move All to Selected Default Groups
When this service is enabled, Lightning Launcher will open automatically when you hover the cursor over the App Library icon on the right of dock for about half a second.\n(This may make it difficult to access the default launcher)\n \nMake sure to enable the \"Use Lightning Launcher\" switch - the \"Lightning Launcher Shortcut\" switch won\'t do anything on the Quest!
Runs in Own Window Launch in Own Window Once Refresh Icon / Banner
Launching 2D apps or websites in their own window allows for easier multitasking on Quest devices, but will cause certain apps to not always launch.\n\nIf you have any issues, disable this option! Turning this option off will hide the top bar when not in Edit Mode. \n \nThe settings button will also be hidden when not in Edit Mode.\n \nTo turn on Edit Mode, press the back button on the top of the window, or B on your controller.
Websites in Lightning Launcher Easily Access Websites & Web Apps
Websites will appear as apps on your home screen, and will open in a custom browser in the same window. Any 2D website works.
Audio in the Background
After being closed, websites will continue running, and can play and record audio in the background - even while in a game!\n \nAn indicator will be shown on the icon of any running website;\nPress the indicator to fully stop that website.
Add a Website Add a Website to the Launcher Enter Any Website URL Enter a valid URL and try again This website is already in %1$s Added websites can play audio in-game Add to %s
Shortcuts Services Easily Access Lightning Launcher By enabling the shortcut service, Lighting Launcher will open when you hover over the chosen icon on the dock, basically replacing that app. Enabling the Shortcut Service 1. Use the button to open Android\'s accessibility settings\n2. Select the service you wish to enable\n3. Switch the service on at the top of the page\n4. Tap \"Allow\" on the prompt\n5. \'X\' out of the window and enjoy! Continue to Accessibility Settings
Important Info Cancel Got It! Confirm Continue

Downloading Latest Versionâ€¦ You should get a prompt to install in a few seconds Hide
Failed to download package! Make sure you have a good internet connection and try again later
Skip updating to version %1$s? You will not be notified about this update again.\n \nKeep in mind that updates are highly recommended and may include important fixes.\n \nIf you are avoiding this update because it causes issues, report your issues at github.com/threethan/LightningLauncher\n \nYOU CAN UPDATE LATER FROM THE SETTINGS! I Understand, Skip It Just Dismiss

LightningLauncher: No Websites Running LightningLauncher: Running a Website LightningLauncher: Running %1$d Websites This notification keeps your websites\' background audio running smoothly.
Install Shortcuts Shortcuts make it easier to open the launcher. \nIt\'s highly recommended that you set up use at least one. Return to Settings
Messenger App Shortcut Adds an icon, which you can pin to the dock, that looks like Facebook Messenger, but will actually open the launcher. \n(This won\'t install if the real Messenger app is installed)
Explore Shortcut Service Install then activate to open LightningLauncher whenever you hover over the "Explore" button. \n(Faster if the Explore app is disabled) Disable/Enable the Explore app
Library Shortcut Service Install then activate to open LightningLauncher whenever you hover over the "App Library" button. \n(This makes it hard to open the quest\'s app library)
Install Update Activate Remove
